casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 26, 2010

[Cite as 03/2612010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-1247.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1405. Cincinnati School Dist. Bd. of Edn. v. Hamilton Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2007-A-1196. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of the motion of Fenco Development Co. and Craig Fennel for continuance of oral argument before a master commissioner scheduled for April 1, 2010,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
